jump_scares.spoiler: A man opens the door revealing Eddie in his non-human state
The cop searching for the beast is suddenly grabbed
A Facehugger jumps out of the egg and lands on Kane’s helmet
Dallas accidentally kicks something over, causing Ripley to cry out in surprise
The Facehugger drops onto Ripley’s shoulder
The Facehugger twitches as Ash pokes it
Blood spurts out of Kane’s chest and a few seconds later an alien bursts out of it
A cat hisses and runs away
The alien comes into view behind Brett
An alien appears in front of Dallas. [Video]
Ash grabs Parker
The cat jumps out at Ripley
An alien hand extends out in front of Ripley
The rover door is suddenly opened after the children question where the adults are
Burke puts his face near a tank when suddenly one of the creatures slams against the inside wall of the tank
The team walk through a corridor when a silhouette runs past the screen
One of the crew members finds a body which suddenly opens its eyes when its head is lifted
An alien attached to the wall jumps off to grab one of the crew members
An alien pokes its head through the door before the group begin to leave
Ellen emerges from underneath the bed and is suddenly attacked by a small alien
After setting off the sprinklers, Ellen is jumped at again by the small alien
One of the men looks into the vents and spots a group of aliens approaching
Pvt. Vasquez looks at an upwards opening in the vent and spots an alien coming down
The pair start to go up the elevator when an alien reaches in
When the crew land, Bishop is attacked by an alien
Ellen’s ankle is grabbed as she tries to climb the ladder
With a loud thud a pack of syringes drops from the chimney
The slit closes onto Scott’s fingers
Kate opens doors, startling Nick
Tony has abrupt flashbacks of Kate falling
A creature jumps towards the phone camera
“I see you” message appears on the TV
Abrupt jump cut with a sound effect
Nick jumps onto Tony
TV explodes
Tony breaks through the glass pane
An alien creature screeches at Moses as he searches through the car, a couple of seconds later it leaps at his face
The alien suddenly attacks one of the policemen as he closes the van doors, a few seconds later it pounces on the other policeman
The alien appears by the door to the van
The alien lunges at the windscreen
The alien attacks Hi Hatz’ henchman as he turns around
There is a loud bang on the door
Moses looks through the peephole in the door a second time and the alien suddenly lunges at the door
The alien smashes in the recycling bin that Biggz is hiding in
The alien lunges at Biggz as he peers out of the recycling bin
The alien bangs on the lift
An alien knocks over Jerome
Jerome grabs Pest’s ankle
One of the Heptapods places a tentacle on the barrier near where Louise is standing
During a dream where Louise is talking to Ian in her room, Louise looks up and Ian has been replaced by a Heptapod
The Heptapod places a tentacle on the barrier causing Louise and Ian to be pushed back by an unseen force
As the man reaches into the water to touch the parasite, it jumps onto him
A parasite walks onto the security camera and shrieks
A man gets sliced into chunks by one of the traps
White Arlene is lifting the blinds up, something flies into the window
A hand hits the car window after Noah calls out to uncle Morgan
In Doctor Thurman’s office, Donnie screams “I can see him right now” and, accompanied by a sound effect, the camera cuts to Frank who is standing in front of him
Ricky (one of the bullies) grabs Gretchen in Grandma Death’s cellar
There is a loud explosion on the plane
There is a loud explosion followed by another about 15 seconds later
A gunshot may startle some viewers
There is an explosion and sparks fly from up ahead in the tunnel
Holly screams loudly
There are several more explosions and sparks fly once more
There is an explosion and more sparks as Holly runs through the tunnel
One of the creatures appears in front of the camera
Two creatures appear behind Holly
A creature appears in front of Holly as she approaches J.P
Another creature appears as Holly opens a door
A monkey jumps against a cage and screeches
A pipe comes loose causing The Kid to shoot his gun
Something jumps down onto a table behind Portman and Goat
Dr. Carmack grabs Samantha while lying on the operating table
Destroyer pokes his head through a hole and is attacked by a monkey. [Video]
Portman is pulled under the water
Goat is attacked by a creature
A creature jumps out at John
Samantha runs into Duke
Mac is suddenly beheaded
A creature grabs Destroyer
A creature’s hand reaches down and grabs Portman around the face. [Video]
Several infected people suddenly rush at the remaining soldiers
For a 5 minute period, the camera switches to John’s first person POV and various creatures leap out suddenly and attack John
Sarge bursts through a glass wall behind John
A door opens from behind Dr. William Weir
Weir is grabbed on his shoulder from behind
Miller is startled by a floating hand that appears from behind
A disfigured face pops out from behind one of the crew members as she investigates a stuck CD
The lights flicker then Weir sees a person appear next to him
Lights explode around one of the crew members
Something bangs heavily on the door
Flashing images occur as Miller puts his head against the wall
Peters falls down a hole in the ground
D.J. gets attacked after spinning around
One of the crew member’s helmets is opened dramatically
Sophia sees Courtney on the other side of the elevator
Courtney quickly opens the shower curtain during a tense scene
A coprse appears in the bathtub from under the shower curtain
A hand appears on the window of the wrecked car that Courtney is looking through
A few short cuts to the car crash may startle some viewers
Jamie’s girlfriend appears behind him briefly before the phone rings
Loud static comes out of the radio
Courtney tries to leave down the fire escape but Tessa appears in front of her
While swimming, Marlo has a flashback to her “flatlining” experience where she is floating face down in the water
Marlo looks up and sees the word “MURDERER” written on the morgue cabinet
A corpse appears behind Marlo
The radio crackles into life
All the cabinets on Jamie’s boat suddenly open
Jamie sees his ex-girlfriend
A hand reaches out and touches Jamie’s shoulder
Jamie is stabbed in the hand as he tries to climb out of the water
As the elevator door begins to close, Sophia briefly sees the girl from her class
Marlo is suddenly suffocated with a plastic bag
The corpse suddenly grabs Marlo around the throat
Marlo is suddenly lifted in the air and thrown backwards by an unseen force
The doors burst open
A squirrel falls into the fireplace
Jump cut to some knocking
A ghost boy appears directly in front of the scope
The closet door behind the sniper slams shut
It is revealed to be a ghost woman standing at the desk
A nazi body falls and is hanged
The boy appears in the water and then a moment later behind the soldier
The ghost woman appears and screams
The woman appears behind the sniper
After a tense scene the spaceship explodes mid sentence
Maisie jumps out at her nanny (as a joke)
Some small raptors run out of the abandoned car as Owen approaches it, a few seconds later a larger raptor jumps on the car
The Indoraptor suddenly clamps on to Wheatley’s arm
The Indoraptor suddenly tackles one of the armed guards as Eli talks to Claire and Owen
Accompanied by a sound effect, we see the dead guard suddenly pulled out of sight
The fighting Raptors break the window in front of Owen and Maisie as they scale the side of the house
A T-Rex suddenly ambushes Eli as he bends down to pick up the DNA sample
A burning moose jumped in the shot
The whisperer’s mouth abruptly opens, releasing blinding lights onto John
A clown jumps out of the pizza box
A bunch of tiny clown heads come out of the laundry hamper
There is a sudden glass shattering sound that startles April
April is grabbed on the head by the green demon
Fred opens the car trunk and the man inside jumps out and grabs him
There is a loud gunshot during a quiet scene
Skip opens the car door, breaking Amy out of her daze
As Morgan walks towards Amy, Lee suddenly appears in view behind Morgan
Metal horse gets spit out by Jean Jacket onto Oj’s car
A man with a knife suddenly lunges at Nick
The cat jumps up at Dan’s face
The body suddenly jolts upwards and begins yelling
Megan’s father abruptly hits his head on the window behind Megan
A hand breaks through the door while Dan and Megan are talking
A young boy lying motionless on the ground suddenly jumps up and attacks a man
A bloodied hand appears on a window
Alice starts to drink from a pond when a mutant suddenly jumps out of it and attacks her
A monster breaks out from underneath some rubble
The creature pierces the roof of the truck that Alice is driving
After colliding with Alice’s car, the creature suddenly roars at Alice
There is a loud noise as Alice bangs into a metallic object
Alice is startled by a printer kicking into life
The red queen says “behind you” and Alice turns around to see a mutant running at her
An armed man pops up as Alice approaches the Umbrella Corporation motorbike
A zombie runs at Chu
A zombie rushes at Alice as she enters Dr. Isaacs’ tank
Alice shoots a flaming zombie
One of the dogs suddenly attacks Christian
Claire yells out to Alice who turns around as a zombie attacks her
The lights start to switch back on
The blades of the fan start to spin as Claire and Abigail go through it
A man falls through a trap door
A mutant rushes past the screen
Razor drops down behind Alice
One of the chained up corpses suddenly lunges at Razor as he walks past it
The mutant attacks Razor
The mutant gets up and runs away
Alice walks into a chain
The mutant drops down from the ceiling
The apparently dead creature gets up and attacks once more
Doc puts his hand on Alice’s shoulder
There is a loud (although not unexpected) explosion
A zombie attacks Dr. Isaacs
There is suddenly a loud flash of several spooky images accompanied by a loud sound effect
Oz has a vision where he sees a clone of himself slowly approaching him. Suddenly, there is a cut to the clone’s face as he begins to scream
There is a sudden flash of Oz’s clone screaming
An elevator suddenly starts, propelling Norman and Beth upwards
Beth turns around and sees a mummified corpse
Holographic images of space appear in front of Beth after she taps on the computer screen
A sea snake attacks Norman
As the crew explore the Icarus I, something dislodges from the ship and makes a loud bang
Icarus II abruptly disengages from Icarus I
Pinbacker suddenly attacks Capa
Pinbacker impales Corazon with a scalpel
An abrupt cut to Mace crying out as he climbs out of the coolant reservoir may startle some viewers
Pinbacker grunts loudly and punches through a glass wall
Hippy spies on the SEALs attaching the warhead to one of the remote operated vehicles. He tries to go back to warn the others but Coffey is standing right behind him
Lindsey attempts to radio for help and gets as far as “Deep Core this is Cab One we need assist…..” before sparks come out of the electronics and the power goes out
The nurse screams when she sees the blob, and loud music begins to play
Steve gets startled by Jane when he walks around the corner
After Steve goes off screen, there’s a loud sound of cans falling down
Evan suddenly appears in the kitchen holding a knife
A bright camera flash may startle some viewers
Evan’s dad is suddenly on top of Evan strangling him
Lenny forcefully pushes Evan up against a wall
A car slams into the car that Telly and Ash are in
Agent Petalis is suddenly sucked through the roof at great speed by an unseen force. [Video]
Anne Pope is sucked off the ground and disappears into the sky. [Video]
While chasing Sam, Telly runs around a corner and sees the agent standing in front of her
The agent’s face suddenly distorts and the windows around him blow out
The agent grabs Telly around the neck
The agent is sucked through the roof of the hangar
Principal Drake turns around and is surprised by Coach Willis standing behind her
Coach Willis appears behind Casey
Mrs Brummel appears behind Stan in the showers
Casey runs out of the closet
Gabe runs into Stan in the school hallway
Zeke screams as he enters the classroom
Principal Drake, who appeared to be dead, suddenly stands up
Stan jumps up at the window while Stokes is looking out
Delilah surprises Casey
Marybeth hits Stokes
Zeke grabs onto the fence, surprising Stokes and Casey. [Video]
Brundlefly bursts through the glass window of the hopsital room where Veronica is about to have an abortion
Brundlefly jumps down from the ceiling onto Borans
The sudden appearance of a moth-like figure on the road causes Mary to swerve and crash the car
Mary gasps and appears shocked to see her husband sitting beside her bed
John turns over in bed and has a vision of his wife lying in the bed beside him
John smashes his head into the mirror. [Video]
A corpse hanging upside down suddenly drops from the trees
As Casey reaches towards a dead soldier, there is a loud bang on the window
As Casey and Quinn back away from the stairs, The Predator suddenly appears behind them
The Predator suddenly drops through the ceiling into Rory’s room
As Baxley says “That’s the stupidest fu***ng thing I’ve ever heard”, sparks fly from the tree trunk behind him as he narrowly avoids being shot
The device suddenly attaches itself to a scientists arm
As the speaking character turns around to face the camera, they are unexpectedly shot in the chest in the middle of a calm monologue with no warning
As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side

While a character screams a triumphant phrase, a giant tentacle suddenly falls on them with a loud thud and squishes them, halting the uplifting music score and instantly shifting the tone of the scene
Kate jumps out of a box to scare Matt as a joke
While Kate is lowering a dead bird into the soil, some objects suddenly fall down on the ground right behind her
While Matt is touching a wall, Kate suddenly calls out to him, frightening him and causing him to jump
Matt opens the door, frightening Shane and causing him to drop the snow globe and shatter it
After Matt says “It’s not loaded,” Shane suddenly fires the gun to the ground as a warning
Lars scares Derek by shouting “boo” from behind him
The creature suddenly escapes from the block of ice. [Video]
One of The Thing’s tentacles shoots out and impales Henrik
As Lars enters a building, he is grabbed by something and pulled inside
A miniature “Thing” jumps at Kate
The Thing bursts through a window in front of Carter
One of The Thing’s tentacles suddenly lashes out at Kate as she inches towards the grenade
A dog leaps out at Clark
Something moves past a doorway in front of Fuchs
Norris and Nauls attack MacReady from behind
Copper attempts to defibrillate Norris when a giant hole opens in Norris’s chest. [Video]
Palmer’s blood has a violent reaction when MacReady tests it with the copper wire
Blair appears behind Garry
The ground begins to erupt in front of MacReady
A girl narrates about her respect for her policeman father, who is looking at the camera and smiling. Suddenly, his head explodes
The mutant jumps out from behind some cops
The man in the black coat walks past in the background accompanied by a string sound effect
As Hector looks down the naked woman’s body, an unseen assailant suddenly stabs Héctor in the arm
The man with the bandaged head suddenly looks through the window at Héctor
A table is thrown at Héctor as he climbs the stairs
A daydreaming Emma is interrupted by Gracie who appears in front of her
Gracie coughs blood onto a boy
A helicopter flies overhead startling Emma
Emma looks through the letterbox flap and sees a figure move past the front door
During a tense scene Stacey’s boyfriend jumps out at Emma (as a joke)
Emma watches through a hole in the wall as a girl is attacked by an infected person
The infected boy appears in front of the peephole
A loud bang startles Stacey and Emma
Bright lights appear in front of Emma and Stacey as they drive down a dark road
Emma looks through the peephole on the front door and sees Evan’s father (who is now infected)
A figure moves past the window
There is a loud bang from outside the house
Evan’s father bursts through a window
There is a gunshot (followed by another approximately 15 seconds later)
Stacey grabs CJ and pulls him towards the opening in the wall
Stacey’s hand reaches out to grab the plate of food
Stacey wakes up as Emma attempts to pull the worm out
Evan shines the torch into a room full of infected people
An infected person lunges at Emma and Evan as they are running away
An infected person punches a hole through the door
When Eddie tries to meditate a loud noise from the neighbors bothers him
A screaming lady runs into eddie
Eddie looks in the mirror and a voice says eddie and his eyes become black
Venom suddenly says FOOD when eddie is on the phone
Eddie reacts violently when the MRI Scan starts
Another mild jumpscare when Venom suddenly says HUNGRY
Eddie is bothered by the neighbour again and when the neighbour said “whatever” Eddie suddenly roars at him with a scary face
When Dan says we don’t got a lot of time, venom suddenly grabs him by the neck
When Carlton drake says “This is the last time I’m asking you where is my symbiote,” he suddenly transforms to Riot shout WHERE IS HE
Riot suddenly grabs one of his researchers
